inn1.comm: gets the first ball to straighten gently into Hafeez who defends solidly from the crease.
big swing. Uncontrolled from Vitori though, and it swerves down the leg side after landing on middle and leg.
short midwicket nearly in business! Viroti again gets the ball to duck into Hafeez who falls over as he flicks and the ball goes uppishly. Just past the catcher.
whoa, big deviation again. Vitori gets it to angle across towards middle and then dart in and cramp Hafeez as it hits the pad. Surely going down the leg side, and they pinch the leg bye.

elegant from Farhat, not so elegant from Waller running across from third man. Width outside off, Farhat sets himself up nicely and square drives. Waller runs across and puts in the slide, but can't stop it cleanly.
shorter length, the ball carries through nicely as Farhat moves the bat away from the line.
Farhat taps the last ball towards midwicket for a single. Not the best of starts for Vitori this.
whanged in back of a length and it angles across. Farhat stays in the crease and defends to the off side.
Farhat looks to nudge to the leg side and scoot across, but Jarvis is onto the ball real quick. Hafeez denies the single and Farhat scrambles back in. Jarvis' under-arm throw missed in any case.

he doesn't seem to have too many fans among our readers, but Farhat is looking good so far. Over-pitched outside off, he picked up the length in a trice, reached out to the pitch and drove it sumptuously through the covers.
on the pads this time, Farhat whips it down to fine leg for one more. Zimbabwe are all over the place in these first 2 overs.
you can place as many slips as you want, but it won't help if you bowl short and wide. Hafeez is in too good form to let it go, and eases it in front of point for three more.
pitched up on off, Farhat shuffles into line and check drives to mid-off.
very poor from Vitori. Another one angles in tamely onto the hips and Hafeez glances it down to fine leg, well to the right of the catcher, and it is four more.
here comes the over-compensation. Short and wide outside off, Hafeez seems to be enjoying himself. Almost like he's having a net. He scythes this up and over point for four more.
wide down the leg side now. Anyone with a radar around Harare? Your team needs one right now.
could almost see it coming. Short, wide outside off. Hafeez guides the cut with more finesse than this time, backward of point for another boundary.
goes very wide of the crease in an effort to cut the angle. Hafeez waits for the ball to come on to his pads and clips through square leg for two more.
back of a length on off stump. Arguably the first good ball of the over. Hafeez defends to short midwicket.
back of a length again, Hafeez stays back and works it towards midwicket.
Jarvis angles another one across Farhat who defends into the off side.
effort ball from Jarvis, and a good line too. Just outside off, that whizzed off the turf past Farhat who was clearly late on a cramped cut. He doesn't connect.
on a length around off stump, Farhat defends to cover. Three dot-balls on the trot - a minor win for Zim.
make that four. Fuller length outside off, Farhat moves nicely into position but his drive finds mid-off.
still can't get it away. Perfect length from Jarvis, Farhat forces it into the covers.
finishes the over with a poor ball, on the pads, and Farhat whips it to a sloppy fine-leg fielder who concedes the second. Still, a pretty good over that from KJ.
Vitori again wafts it in from wide of the crease, Hafeez defends from the crease. He likes to drive and cut, so this is the perfect line and length if you are bowling at Hafeez.
once again, late slant into Hafeez who plays watchfully from the crease.
cramps him again, Hafeez is stuck on the crease as he looks to work it around, but it beats the bat to hit the pad.
fuller length, but he's again snaking it in sharply into Hafeez, who presses forward to defend.
Hafeez is getting nothing to hit in this over. He hangs back and defends another back of length ball coming into him.
goes much wider outside off to end the over, and Hafeez shoulders arms. Maiden to Vitori.
here comes the release. Jarvis experiments with a fuller ball, probably looking for late inward movement, but this was far too wide. Farhat just laid into it and crunched it uppishly through point.
shorter, faster and straighter. The result - Farhat is caught on the crease, beaten by the pace and movement. He's hit on the pad, but it was heading down the leg side.
too straight this time, and Farhat quietly nudges through square leg for one.
short ball shaping away outside off. Hafeez lets it go.
back of a length again around off stump, and Hafeez blocks from the crease.
he's over-stepped now. First foot-fault of the series this, and well - on replays that seems like a harsh call. Fuller length, just outside off, and Hafeez inner edges it towards the keeper.
full and wide outside off, Hafeez redirects it backward of point and it is headed for the boundary until a flying Masakadza intervenes after charging across from third man.
he's giving Farhat more room than he should. This time, Farhat times the cover drive ominously, but finds the fielder in the circle.
not so well-timed this time, forced off the front foot into the covers.
Farhat hangs back in the crease and steers towards point cautiously.
he gets the single this time, staying back in the crease and opening the face to guide it backward of point.

the radar is not with Zimbabwe, it is with Pakistan! Short from Vitori, angling into the batsman, and Hafeez responds with an imperious pull. It seemed set to sail towards the midwicket boundary, but hang on.. There was a man at deep midwicket. And Hafeez could not have picked him out more accurately if he had tried to.
big movement down the leg side, and exemplary keeping from Taibu to go all horizontal and snap it up before it flew away for five wides.
full length to end the over, Shafiq gets forward to defend.
lovely ball from Jarvis, he gets it to dart away from back of a length and Farhat is caught feeling for it from the crease.
and again, beaten comprehensively. Farhat played a confident-looking off-drive, but he completely failed to spot the away movement and played it inside the line.
ah, Jarvis goes too full this time. Farhat loves it when he doesn't have movement to contend with, and this one was full enough to allow him the freedom of driving sumptuously into the covers.
Jarvis pulls it back now, and promptly beats him with the nagging away movement. Good reason to bring in a second slip, I'd say. Farhat flashes away loosely and misses again.
you won't see too many pulls going through mid-off! Short and pacy from Jarvis, Farhat picked the length late and forced the fore-hand from well outside off between the bowler and mid-off.
back of a length and on the stumps to end the over. Farhat defends towards mid-on.
Vitori delivers another one from wide of the crease, he's almost releasing the ball from silly mid-off. Shafiq tries to work it with the angle to the leg side.
short of a length outside off and good carry towards Shafiq who reaches out to meet it.
another foot-fault, this time from Vitori. It is for cutting the bowling crease, not the side lines.
got to love a free-hit! Shafiq doesn't have a care in the world as he opens up the leg side, exposing his stumps, and mows a full ball through midwicket.
uppish but safe. Vitori again gets late movement into the right-hander, and Shafiq's flick goes in the air to the left of short midwicket. It was timed well enough to scurry away to the boundary.
shortens the length this time, and it finishes on middle and leg. Shafiq works it to the leg side.
Shafiq defends a length ball from the crease down the track.
Jarvis dangles another one on Farhat's pads and he looks to turn the strike with a clip to the leg side. Can't beat the fielder this time.
angled across the stumps, Farhat is behind the line as he defends.
fuller length and straightening into Farhat who times the off-drive well, but finds mid-off.
inevitably a ball is bowled wide of the off stump and Farhat punishes it through point. There is protection in the deep.
draws Shafiq forward with a full length, he defends quietly down the track.
the ball is still moving. This one darts away from outside off stump, and Shafiq shoulders arms.
on the pads, Farhat works it to the leg side without timing.
jaffa. Farhat is squared up by seamwork that leaves him even as the ball bounces big. Nice work from Elton, that ball.
width outside off, Farhat indulges himself with the cut and gets a single past point.
Shafiq shoulders arms as Elton lands one well wide of off stump.
fuller length outside off, Shafiq eases into the drive but finds cover.
goes wide of the crease to end the over, and Shafiq doesn't poke at it.
Farhat opens the face and guides a single backward of point.
Jarvis extracts some away nip off a length, Shafiq dabs into the off side and looks for a single.
angles the face this time and runs the ball down to third man for one.
show Farhat a touch of room and he will throw his bat at it with all the fury in the world. Waller at short cover does really well to stop it.
ah, edged through the now vacant slip region. Farhat again goes hard at a slightly wide ball and it flies away to the left of the keeper.
Farhat shoulders arms outside off, now that's a rarity.
back of a length from Elton, Shafiq dabs another single with an opened face, towards third man.
Farhat looks to work a length ball across the line to the leg side, but can't find the gap.
Farhat looks to whip off the pads this time, but finds square leg.

Masakadza at mid-off tries to make a mockery of Newton's laws, but gravity eventually prevails. Farhat gets under a length ball and muscles the off-drive in the air, and for a moment would have been concerned. But Masakadza's leap couldn't quite get there.
perfect length to Farhat, short enough to ensure he can't drive, and wide enough to force him to go for it. He throws his bat at it, and misses.
and again, Farhat's violent swish sets up a strong breeze across the ground but doesn't connect.
full length around off stump, Shafiq defends solidly
generously tossed up, Shafiq continues to defend.
whoa, that bounced a lot. Price rips this in on a length, gets it to it and jump past Shafiq's nervous attempt to steer. Well bowled, nice set-up.
Shafiq gets one on the pad and looks to dab to the leg side for one, but midwicket is in the way.
Shafiq again tries to work one with the angle, but can't get it away.
Price begins with a maiden. Shafiq punches from the crease, straight to mid-on.
Elton lands it on a length around middle and off, Farhat defends from the crease.

Elton does the job. He's tied Farhat down with the tight lengths, and suddenly goes fuller, and I suspect, slightly slower. Farhat was too eager to drive, he seemed to be early on the shot and scooped it in the air towards cover, who tumbled forward to take a smart catch.
typical, wristy, flourishy start from Younis who leans out to drive a full ball towards point.
back of a length and angling in, Younis defends to the leg side.
short of a length again, outside off, Younis doesn't meddle with it.
fuller ball to end the over, a wicket maiden. Younis drives it straight to mid-on. That's two maidens on the trot from Zim.
flat from Price, Shafiq wiorks it off the pads behind square.
tossed up on the pads, Shafiq gets it through midwicket for a single.
Younis leans out to cover the line and defends to the leg side.
tossed up on leg stump, Younis works it to midwicket.
misfield at square leg, Utseya the culprit. Younis is away with a wristy flick.
on a length around off, gets Shafiq into the drive and he nearly plays it back to the bowler. The last 3 overs have yielded 2 runs.

classy from Younis. It was full and wide, he went into the drive and didn't bother to keep it down. He didn't have to. It was a packed arc in the covers, but Younis' wrists had found the gap perfectly.
cuts the room this time, Younis punches the full ball to mid-off.
well bowled, holds the length back and gets the offcutter to quietly nip in, hit the inner edge and strike Younis' pad.
good length again, gets Younis reaching out to drive and he mistimes it into the covers.
short of a length outside off, Younis stays beside the line as he taps into the covers.
Younis can't time the cut away, he didn't have much room to work with. Another good over from Elton, despite the boundary ball
Price cramps Shafiq for room with the angle, but he still goes for a very late dab which finds point.
on the pads, Shafiq nudges it straight to midwicket.
tossed up, Shafiq drives through extra cover to turn the strike.
Younis looks to drive with the angle, but finds midwicket.
back of a length and hurrying through, Younis can't do much with it.
Price sprays the last one down the leg side, and Younis cashes in with a dainty little tap-glance towards fine-leg
width outside off for Shafiq, who mistimes the cut and finds point.
fuller length on off stump, Shafiq check-drives to mid-off.

too full and too wide, Shafiq plays a good-looking square drive. That man Waller is really a wall at sweeper-cover. Not much has gone past him, after that early blemish. Ah, he fumbles after stopping the ball, and they get three.
short ball, Younis backs away to create room and carve it way, but finds point.
width on offer again, and Younis drives to the right of point for a single.
good bouncer, good because Shafiq clearly wasn't expecting one. Elton put a lot in it, to get that much rise, and Shafiq looked bemused in the end after backing out of the pull.
Price angles towards Younis' pads and he whips off the front foot for a single.
Shafiq skips out close to the pitch of the ball and drives down the ground for a single.
tossed up on the stumps, Younis forces it straight to midwicket.
the wrists come into play this time, and he gets it to the right of midwicket for one.
tossed up, and Younis smarly shuffles inside the line, gets well forward and slap-sweeps it in the air through backward square leg. Expertly done.
flighted outside off, Younis is again well forward as he drives into the covers.
leading edge, but it foes safely to the left of the bowler. Younis shuffled well across and looked to work it to the leg side, but the ball popped away to the off side.

lovely shot. Younis again shuffles into position to punch a good length ball past the stumps. Long-on ran all the way back, put in the slide but didn't stop it cleanly. Zim's fielding standards have dipped alarmingly in recent years.
Younis gets the single this time, into the off side.

this time, Masakadza runs back from mid-on and actually stops the ball with the slide. It was a tougher save this time since Shafiq hit the ball much harder at the bowler, who deflected it past the stumps towards long-on.
short of a length and angling in, Shafiq dinks it to the leg side, but not for runs.
over-pitched on the stumps, Shafiq drills it straight to mid-on.
tossed up outside off, Younis works it back to the bowler.
shorter length, Younis forces it past midwicket for one.
dangerous, but Younis gets through. Tossed up on the stumps, Shafiq paddles it straight to short fine-leg, but Younis was on the single immediately. The fielder took ages to release the ball.
short but turning in from off stump, Younis still manages to cut it through point.
on Shafiq's pads and he works it straight to square leg.
can't get the single away yet. Fuller on off stump, and he drops it to the off side. They decide against a quick single as Taibu comes across.
the Elton bouncer is banged in too short this time. Called wide for height.

I was about to type Younis at his best, but the TV commentator Kepler Wessels beat me to it. Over-pitched on the stumps and it meets the full face of the bat and bounds away along the turf for a straight four.
too full again from Elton, Younis doesn't time the off drive well this time.
holds the length back around off stump, Younis stabs it away into the off side.
too short, too wide, easily guided to deep point for a single.
slower ball, but Shafiq spots it and checks the drive. On the bounce to cover.
holds the length back a touch to end the over, Shafiq tries to steer through the off side, but can't get it past point.
flighted on the pads, Younis is running really well today. He flicks into the deep and hustles back for the second. Extremely fit for his age, is YK.
flighted on off stump this time, Younis drives against the spin into the extra cover area.
Shafiq nudges with the turn to the leg side, but can't get the single.
hits this one much harder to the leg side, but finds midwicket.
softer hands from Shafiq, works a single through wide mid-on.
short of a length outside off, Younis slaps it down the ground for one more.
short ball, Younis still plays with straight bat, uppishly but to the right of the pitch for a single.
fuller to Shafiq who drives solidly into the covers. Utseya dives away to get a hand on it.
Younis punches a single without fuss down the ground.
short and wide outside off, Shafiq guides it well behind point for a single.
over-pitched wide outside off, Younis reaches well across to keep it down and gets a single into the covers.
shunted into the pads, Shafiq glances it towards deep backward square leg for one.
Utseya loops this up on the stumps, Shafiq nudges to the leg side.
fuller length outside off, he drives through the extra cover area for one.
back of a length on the pads, worked through square leg quietly.
gets the single at long last. Shafiq is getting really tied down here.
Younis drives with a flourish into the covers to turn the strike over.
Shafiq leans out of the crease, but can't get the bunt past the bowler.
length ball outside off, Younis punches it back to the bowler.
slower ball on a length and angling into Younis, who drives solidly down the ground for one.
on the pads, Shafiq tucks it through square leg for one.
Masakadza is rolling his fingers across the ball, but Younis easily redirects him through backward point.
short ball outside off, Shafiq eases it off the face to third man for one.
over-pitched on the middle and leg line, Younis drives past mid-on for one.
flighted on middle and leg, Younis whips through midwicket.
no room for the cut, but Shafiq backs away to make it happen. He can't elude point though.
on the pads, and he nudges it through square leg for one.
loopy ball outside off, Younis drives down to wide long-off.
full ball, Shafiq drives down the ground for one more.
touch of width outside off, Younis cuts it away for a single and gets to 40.
another single for Younis, who seems to be playing comfortably on auto-pilot mode. Forces a short ball to deep cover.
width outside off to Shafiq who opens the face to get a single to third man.

Masakadza has dropped him once, and then dropped him a second time! That's one way to look at it. Another is to say that he almost pulled off magic there. Full ball on off stump, and Younis drilled it back violently at Masakadza. He did well to get his hands in position to catch it, but it did not stick, and popped up well to his right. Masakadza regrouped, dived full length to his right, but the ball landed just out of his reach. What an effort!
Younis gets the single this time, working the angle through the leg side.
Shafiq dabs into the covers for another single.
Younis' turn now to drive into the covers for one more.
looped up on middle and leg, Younis works it with the turn to the right of Utseya who does well to stop it.
he gets the single this time, through mid-off.

boy, this is a full-on acrobatics show from Zimbabwe! Kyle Jarvis does some daredevilry at the long-on fence this time. Shafiq charges out, looks to launch it over long-on, but he's not quite to the pitch. Still, he makes reasonable contact and hits it really straight. Jarvis screams across from long-on, leaps across while sticking his left hand out and nearly plucks the best catch of all-time. Nearly.
Shafiq laps a single to the leg side as Utseya angles one in.
Younis taps a back of length ball into the leg side for one more.
Shafiq gets the single straight away, that six should do his confidence some good.
Younis looks to steer a back of length ball from the crease but finds point.
he gets the single this time, pushing Vitori with the angle to the leg side.
edged but safe. Shafiq flashes at a wide ball outside off and the otside edge flies through the vacant cordon.
short of a length and straightening after coming in with the angle. Shafiq drops it to the off side for one.
short and wide outside off, Younis cuts hard but straight to point.
on the pads, Shafiq laps it to the leg side for one.
shot of the day brings up Younis' fifty. What a gem. Tossed up, slow and curving in the air, Younis waited and waited for it to land and then scooped it inside out through extra cover. Lovely shot.
taps a single to the leg side this time as Price angles one into the pads.
Shafiq ticks along, turning the strike back to Younis.
this is well outside leg stump, but Younis clips it along square for one.
Shafiq now works a single through square leg to end a fruitful over.
short and wide outside off, Shafiq plays his go-to shot, the dab to third man, to reach his 50. Well played, young man. Now, to kick on and get a big one.
back of a length outside off, Younis punches to deep cover-point for one.
angled into the pads, easily dropped to the leg side for a single.
Vitori goes fuller, Younis mis-times the on-drive and finds midwicket.
full again, well outside off, Younis is not letting anything go. He drives it to point.
over-pitched on the stumps to end the over, Younis clamps it down the ground for one.
loopy from over the stumps, Younis drives it back down the track to the bowler.
on leg stump this time, Younis flicks through square leg for one.
slower through the air on Shafiq's leg stump and he defends resolutely.

appeal for stumping, and Shafiq could be in trouble. Flighted ball from Price, landed outside leg after passing Shafiq who was lured out of the crease for the flick. He missed, Taibu didn't collect it cleanly at first, but grabbed the rebound off his chest and removed the bails well on time. The umpire seems to have forgotten to signal a wide too.
tossed up on off and middle from round the stumps, Malik defends.
nice shot to get going, Malik rocks back to a ball straightening from off stump and dabs it really late between short third man and point for three.
tossed up by Utseya on off stump, Malik presses forward to defend.
Malik looks for the late dab again, but can't beat the fielder behind square on the off side.
on the pads, Malik nudges through square leg, and the fielder tagging it nearly runs into the square-leg umpire. Quite hilarious!
dropped at midwicket. Zim's fielding continues to inhabit the extremes. Tossed up on leg stump, Younis jumps out to the pitch and whips it straight to Chigumbura, but hard. He clangs it.
Malik drives solidly down the ground for a single.
Younis closes the face and picks up another single through midwicket.
tossed up on the pads, Younis sweeps it through backward square leg.
Malik again hangs back and dinks the arm ball into the off side for a single.
full toss on middle and leg, Younis lashes it through midwicket without much timing.
poor ball, too far outside leg and Malik executes a pretty good paddle sweep on top of the bounce to send it very fine and to the boundary.
speared into the pads from round the stumps, Malik nudges through square leg for one.
tossed up to end the over, Younis inside-outs it through wide mid-off for one.
Younis is looking mighty dangerous now. Tossed up by Utseya in the slot, Younis goes down on a knee and hoicks it easily over midwicket.
flatter, Younis forces it to mid-off.
on the pads again, Younis dabs a single through square leg.
short of a length from over the stumps, Malik punches it down the ground for one.
Younis backs away so much, he seems to be out of balance when he plays the cut. Still gets a couple through covers.
the 200 comes up as Younis milks another single, with the turn through midwicket this time. Pakistan well on course for 300.
tossed up on off stump, Younis drives it back to the bowler.
Price bowls a near yorker on off stump, and Younis again pushes it back to him.
flatter length, Younis gets the single to the leg side.
back of a length and straightening from middle stump, Malik drives it back to the right of the pitch.
big appeal for lbw but it is optimistic, given the angle from which he is bowling. Landed on middle and straightened, but not enough to hit leg stump as Younis missed the flick.
Younis can't get the single away, as Price finishes a tight over.
full face from Malik as he drives down the ground for one.
Younis drives through the covers against the spin but finds extra-cover.
and again ... Younis times the drive well, but can't get it past Taylor.
short of a length and turning down the leg side, Younis dinks it with soft hands towards square leg and hares across for a couple.
well placed. Turning down the leg side again, Younis gets the front leg across and lap-sweeps it to the left of short fine leg. No stopping that one.
punches the last ball past mid-on for a single. Utseya's been expensive today.
back of a length from over the stumps, and Younis punches down the ground for a single.
fullish length on off stump, Malik gets across to defend.

Elton Chigumbura takes a blinder on the rebound! Zimbabwe's fielding continues to be a Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde show. Full ball on off stump, Malik got into the drive and hit it to the left of the bowler at shin-height. Elton reacted superbly on his follow through to pluck it low to his left as he skid and tumbled alongside it.
full ball angling into Misbah's crouching gait, and he works it through mid-on for a single.
holds the length back to Younis, who again slaps it back uppishly but on the other side of the pitch.
angling in from short of a length, Misbah defends from the crease.
angled into the pads, worked through the midwicket region for one.
short ball to Misbah, who stays in the crease and works it to the leg side.

another stunning return catch, and Pakistan are in a spot of strife here. It was in many ways a replay of Malik's dismissal - full ball, eliciting the drive to the left of the bowler, who reacted rapidly to tumble and pluck it low, with both hands this time, on his follow through. Younis seemed to be drawn into the shot early and couldn't keep it down. 300 too optimistic now?
Adnan does the hare-brained running act again. Nearly. Taps the ball and just takes off. Misbah sends him back, wisely.
back of a length around off stump, he stays back in the crease and blocks.
over-pitched on the middle and leg line, Adnan punches down the ground for a single.
tossed up on the stumps, Adnan comes out of the crease and drives it back to the bowler who throws it back to the keeper as Adnan hurries into the crease.
flatter length, Adnan hacks it down the ground for one.
slow and loopy outside off, Misbah defends languidly.
flatter and turning down the leg side, Misbah works it to short fine leg.
slower and very full, Misbah defends it back to the bowler
he scrambles a single to midwicket this time, wristing the ball with the turn to the leg side.
straightens from outside off, Misbah glides it off the face to short third man.
closer to the stumps this time, Misbah angles it to the off side, but can't get the single.
full toss on the stumps, Misbah punches it through wide mid-on for one.
full again to Adnan who pushes it to mid-on.
momentum being lost rapidly here. Adnan works another ball off the pads straight to the fielder.
extra-cover drive with the turn gets him the single, meaning he will retain strike for the next over.
tossed up on the stumps from round the wicket, Adnan chips out and pushes a single to long-on.
nearly on the blockhole this one, and Misbah digs it out past the bowler for one.
Utseya shortens the length, Adnan jumps out and pushes it back to Utseya.
gets the single away this time, he's again down the track but manages to elude Utseya to his right.
rapid wristwork from Misbah gets the single through midwicket.
tight single, but Misbah makes it. Adnan worked it straight to midwicket and took off, Misbah had to really fly in to beat the throw to the keeper.
short ball aimed at Adnan's ribs and he nudges it to the leg side, looking for the single. He runs half way up too and comes back in, as Taibu collects and thinks of having a shy.
yorker from Jarvis, Adnan digs it out into the off side, and Utseya quickly gets to it. He needlessly shies at the stumps though, and concedes the single.
dainty from Misbah. He goes for a stroll across the stumps, gets the full ball on off stump and twinkles it past short fine leg. Expertly done.
full again on off stump, Misbah moves across and clips it daintily through midwicket for more runs.
effort ball, has Adnan in some strife as he jumps up and shoulders arms, but it went marginally down the leg side, and was called wide.
yorker goes wrong, it is a half-volley on off stump but Adnan misses out. He drives it straight to cover.
Adnan finds cover again, drilling a length ball well but without placement.
flighted outside off from Price, Misbah defends into the off side.
Price goes wide of the stumps, Misbah sees him and backs away, Price sees that and follows him. Cat and mouse game this! Single taken to the leg side in the end.
Adnan chips out while opening up the off side and carves insider-out to deep cover for a couple.
well played Adnan, he backs away in search of the off side gap and clatters a slow loopy ball through the covers.
gets the single this time, getting across and pushing through mid-on
Misbah backs away, Price follows him again and seems to have cut out all width, but Misbah still manages to open the wrists and guide him nearly all the way to the deep cover fence. Smart batting.
super yorker from Jarvis. Adnan backs away and looks to squeeze it into the covers, but there's nothing he can do with this ball.

full ball outside off, Adnan drives it straight to Price standing deep in the circle. Misbah wanted one, Adnan didn't respond. Price fumbled and then Adnan wanted the run, but Misbah did not. Yes, no, thank you.
low full toss on the pads, Adnan whips it past midwicket to the deep and they get a single. Poor running, they should have tried to hustle one more.
Misbah walks all across the crease, Jarvis keeps it very full on leg stump and Misbah whips straight to short fine-leg.

Utseya spills one at cover. Short ball outside off, Adnan didn't expect that length as he backed away and looked to carve it. He didn't time it at all and it lobbed to cover, and Utseya should have held on as he tumbled forward.
another yorker, this time wide of off stump, to end the over. Adnan can't dab it away. Jarvis is doing quite well in this spell.
full length ball outside off, Misbah can't get the single as he plays it into the off side.
Misbah stays in the crease and drives a single down the ground.

Adnan walks across the stumps and tries the good old Dougie Marillier scoop. He isn't Dougie Marillier though, and doesn't get bat on it. It lobs up off the pad and lands just behind the stumps as Taibu charges in, but Misbah is too quick for him. Single taken.
another one close to the blockhole, Misbah can't get more than one for it, with a whip to the man at midwicket.
250 comes up as Adnan makes room and drives into the covers for another single.
supreme from Misbah. He walks across again, converts the attempted yorker into a low full toss angling into the pads and flicks it through midwicket for four.
Adnan backs away, almost gets too far away from Jarvis' full ball on middle and off. He manages to squeeze it into the covers for one.
Misbah's go-to shot - he goes well back in the crease, sits on one knee and looks to dump it over the leg side, but Jarvis' length is too full and Misbah can only get a single to long-on.
Adnan again backs away, and uses the pace of the ball to dab the ball between point and short third man. It nearly goes to the fence, and they take three by the time it is tagged.
Misbah again walks across the stumps, and looks to tickle it past short fine leg. He can't get it past that fielder though.
another yorker! Adnan once again opens up the stumps and looks to crash it into the covers, but it whimpers to the fielder without  and pace on it.
Misbah looks to play it Adnan style this time, but Jarvis remains unhittable. Yorker inner edged past leg stump, and only a single taken.
Vitori sprays this wildly down the leg side from well wide of off stump, and it is called a wide. He needs to keep his cool here.
slower ball well outside off, Misbah looks to lace it into the covers and Utseya inside the circle dives to his right to save three runs.

lovely ball, but oh dear! It is a no-ball. Vitori has cut the side line - I dare say, not for the first time today, but he is finally called. Length ball angling in, Adnan can't connect with the heave. He will heave again the next ball.
back of a length from Vitori, did well to ensure Adnan can't drive, and he gets only a single through mid-on.
Misbah backs away to a full toss, and has no room to work with. He forces it for a single into the covers.
yorker almost entirely perfect this time. Adnan forces it meekly into the off side from the leg stump for a single.
Misbah looks to walk inside the line and hoist it with the angle, but Jarvis at backward square leg charges to his left and dives to stop another boundary!

Adnan backs away to the last ball and gets a single into the covers. Pakistan finish with 270, at least 30 short by my reckoning. The Powerplay has only yielded 36 despite the fact that Pak did not lose any wickets in that phase.

inn2.comm: Tanvir starts with a wide and Zim are away.
back of a length on the pads, Vusi clips it square for a couple, and they even thought about a third.
angled across well wide of off stump this time, Vusi has a flat-footed feel for it and misses. Another wide.
that's the length, lands on middle and darts away a touch as Vusi shoulders arms.
similar length, a touch outside off this time and Vusi lets it go again.
wafted across Vusi again, and he shoulders arms once more.
he's getting closer to making him play, but Vusi is happy to let it go again.
another leave after leaning out and across. Solid finish to the over from Tanvir.
back of a length and nipping in from outside off, Chamu looks to force it from the crease and inner edges onto the boot.
he gets away this time, opening the face to steer a single through backward point
nice line from Sohail, he is good at pegging away on this length as we saw in the Test match. Vusi defends after leaning across.
and again, no movement off the seam for Sohail, but he plugs away back of a length. Vusi defends into the off side.
a foot outside off this time, Vusi is happy to let it go once again.
Vusi hangs back in the crease and defends a back of length ball to the off side of the pitch.
fuller from Tanvir to start his second over, Chamu covers the line and defends to the off side.
over-pitched outside off, but Chamu is not in a particularly aggressive mood at the moment. Forced off the inside half towards mid-on.
short of a length on the pads as Chamu shuffles across and gently dabs it down to fine leg for one.
tempts Vusi outside off with a full ball, but he shoulders arms again.
short ball, Vusi stands back in the crease and cuts crisply, but straight to cover.
short of a length outside off, defended from the crease.
good length ball outside off, another leave.
short of a length again, Chamu defends into the covers from the crease. Languid start this from Zim.
angling into the pads from back of a length, Chamu works it to the leg side for one.
fuller from Sohail this time, Vusi defends after getting the front foot across.
short of a length on off stump, Chamu defends without intent to cover. If they are playing to a plan, I am not sure what it might be.
ah, change of plans. Chamu rides the bounce of a short of good length ball and crunches it on the up through the covers. Good-looking shot, that.
Tanvir slants another one across Vusi, close to being called a wide, but not quite.
short of a length, Vusi stands tall beside the line and drives it pleasingly into the covers.
on a length again, Vusi covers the line and defends as it angles across.
wafted across once again from over the stumps, Vusi lets it go.
length ball, punched solidly back at Tanvir who parried it away on his follow through to the right of mid-on, and they eventually get a single.
Chamu stays in the crease and defends a length ball with the full face, back to the bowler.

whoa, sharp from Sohail. It nipped in sharply off the seam, and Vusi was caught feeling for it loosely without getting the front foot across. The inside edge flies to the right of the off stump and through to fine leg for four.
he drops a short ball to point and they scurry across for a single even as Yasir Shah throws the stumps down. Took a while collecting and releasing, and they got in easily.
short of a length outside off, Chamu guides it towards point.
width outside off, and Chamu latches on again with a flowing cover drive on the up. He finds cover this time.
Sohail sends down another offcutter, and Chamu is cramped as he looks to play it through the off side.
another indipper to end the over, Chamu nudges it wide of mid-on and they pinch a single.
Tanvir lands this on the pads, easy glance for Chamu down to deep backward square leg for one.

another direct hit and umpire Russel Tiffin goes upstairs. Vusi is in some strife here. He advanced down the track and worked a length ball towards mid-on. Shafiq motored towards the ball, swooped, picked up and hurled the stumps down at the bowler's end. Strange running that from Vusi, he wasn't at full stretch and seemed to ground his bat at an angle away from the stumps. Very close. Might be saved by a frame. The bat was on the line by the looks of it, when the stumps broke. Saved. The third umpire took for ever, and there was some doubt. You could say Vusi was a little lucky there.
fuller length to Chamu who gets forward and across to defend.
Chamu motions out of the crease and defends into the off side as he is still short of getting to the length.
Tanvir angles this one in from wide of the stumps and it goes down the leg side.
Chamu squeezes a single off the outer half through backward point.
short of a length from round the stumps and Vusi nearly whips it off the back foot straight to midwicket. Lands just short.
length ball from Sohail, Vusi drops it towards point from the crease.
over-pitched outside off, Vusi mistimes the drive through the off side.
short again, angling into Vusi's pads and he flicks through midwicket for one.
effort ball, Chamu ducks under the bouncer as it angles in.
back of a length outside off, Chamu forces the drive without timing towards cover.
short of a length again, Chamu hangs back in the crease and defends.
well played. Vusi walks down the track and hoicks it with the angle over square leg for four.
and again. Poor from Tanvir, slanting another one down the leg side and Vusi glances it past short fine leg even as he advances towards the ball.
back of a length and angling across, Vusi defends towards point.
he's suddenly woken up, has Vusi. He again walks across the stumps and looks to lap the length ball over short fine leg. He nearly finds the man, it lands just short.
slower ball raps the pads and there's a confident appeal from Tanvir. Tough to get from that angle, it landed outside leg.

cracking shot, and the chase is finally underway. Width from Tanvir, he stays beside the line waits for it come on and then uncorks the wrists to stunning effect and sends the ball cantering through backward point.
back of a length from Sohail, Chamu can't get bat on it as it nips off the seam.
another dot ball as Chamu is stuck on the crease, trying to force a length ball away.
short of a length and angling in, Chamu works it to the leg side with the angle.
slower ball, back-of-the-hand stuff. Chamu spots it and nudges a single through backward square leg.
short outside off this time, Vusi dabs it with soft hands behind square for one more.
too short and too wide, Chamu lashes it in front of point with interest. Suddenly, this start isn't looking too bad.
tossed up on off, Vusi drives with the angle down to long-on for one.
Chamu plays from the crease and eases a single through wide mid-on.
on middle and off, Vusi works it with the wrists wide of backward square leg for one.
Chamu dabs with the turn through square leg. Another single.
and a fifth as Vusi works with the angle through square leg for one.
holds the length back this time, and Chamu works it straight to midwicket.
ample width offered outside off as he delivers from wide of the crease, and Vusi steers through point to bring up the 50 of the opening stand.

lucky for the second time off the inside edge. Cheema darts this one in from wide of the crease and the inner edge is chopped just wide of off stump down to fine leg. This time he doesn't get the boundary though.
back of a length and angling in, Vusi drops it to point and Chamu hares across for the single.

Chamu's played some champagne shots today. Another one, utterly smoked through the covers. Back of a length outside off, it wasn't right up there for the drive, and Chamu just went at it with a solid flow of the hands on the rise, even as he moved into line.
attempted legcutter lands on off and straightens, Chamu gets it away off the outer half through to third man for a single.
angled in once again from wide of the crease, Sibanda defends from the crease.
turning down the leg from middle and off, Chamu misses the dink to the leg side.
slower and fuller, Chamu forces it through mid-on for one.
Sibanda chips out and works a length ball back to the bowler.
Sibanda hangs back and punches a short ball to long-on for one. Adnan yells "Yourself... Well done well done well done". Every single ball.
Chamu can't get this one away past mid-on.
and again, finds Misbah at mid-on as he works a length ball off the pads.
you can try stopping Sibanda from pulling, but you won 't succeed. He does it again, goes after a short ball and miscues it just out of the reach of square leg and midwicket running back.
back of a length this time outside off, Chamu defends from the crease.,
Hafeez nearly pulls off a blinder at point. Short of a length outside off, Chamu smashes it square and Hafeez sticks the right hand out, but it doesn't stick.
back of a length outside off again, this time Chamu plays it down, on the bounce to Hafeez.

shot of the day from Chamu. Boy, the highlights package is going to be worth watching. Length ball, not over-pitched by any stretch of the imagination, and Chamu just eases into the line and meets it with the full face. Boom. It tracer-bulleted its way down the ground.
Cheema sends down a snorting bumper, has Chamu on the hop as he tries to ride it.
tossed up outside off, and Sibanda drives it to the left of Hafeez who stops it.
turning in from middle and off, Sibanda nudges with the turn to the leg side.
again, worked with the turn to the leg side.
another dot ball as Sibanda leans out to defend a length ball on off stump.
very full on off stump, Sibanda can't get the drive past the bowler. Five dots on the trot.
no maiden for Hafeez as Vusi drives from the crease through wide mid-on for a single.
Cheema sends down a legcutter from wide of the crease, and Sibanda defends towards point.
back of a length again, defended into the off side.
back of a length outside off, Sibanda steers with an open face to third man.
Chamu stays in the crease and chops a length ball away into the off side.
short of a length outside off, pushed firmly to mid-off but Sibanda responded soon enough to make the single.
Sibanda opens the face and dabs a short ball towards point.
tossed up on middle and off, Chamu inside edges the flick onto his boot. Pakistan are tightening the screws here.
straighter ball on off stump, he plays it back to the bowler.
Chamu jumps out to the pitch and works a single through wide mid-on.
Sibanda drives a full ball through mid-on for another single.
holds the length back outside off, and Chamu punches it back to the bowler.
width outside off, but Chamu can't cash in. He drives it straight to the cover fielder.
Cheema lands one on a length wide of off stump, and Sibanda goes for a big swipe through the off side. Swing and miss.
shortens the length outside off, Sibanda dabs it through backward point for a single.
short ball dragged really short and wide, Chamu can't play a proper short at it. Harsh on the batting team to not call that a wide.
back of a length outside off, Chamu covers the line and defends into the covers.
Chamu works a single with the angle as Cheema darts it onto his pads.
touch of width outside off, Sibanda tries to punch through the off side, but misses.
turning into the pads, Chamu works it straight to square leg.
Chamu backs away and tries to guide the ball through third man, but there is protection inside the circle.
chipped in the air, almost straight to the man at midwicket. He's getting stuck.
looks to pull this time, the ball is not short enough and he can't connect.
finally some release as he manages to cart a short ball over the infield for a couple to deep midwicket.
back of a length outside off to end the over, defended into the off side.
full-length ball on middle and leg, driven down the ground for a single.
Chamu makes room again and generates impressive bat speed to redirect a short ball on off stump through backward point for a couple.
very well run. Chamu chips out, defends softly to mid-off and scurries through.
short of a length on off stump this time, defended from the crease towards mid-off.
whoa, Sibanda drives awkwardly on the up and pops the ball feebly just over Cheema's head. Seemed to hit quite high on the bat, and mid-off slid around to cut it off.

nearly a run-out. Purposeful short ball from Cheema, had Chamu fending and hopping and the ball dropped to the leg side. They ran for the single, Cheema hustled across, picked up and shied at the bowler's end, but missed.
Hafeez continues to plug away back of a length, Chamu tries to mow him across but finds square leg.
flatter ball, worked from the crease into the leg side.
fuller and Chamu prefers it, he drives a single down the ground.
Sibanda tries to sweep with the angle, but finds the man at 45.
back of a length on off stump, played down the ground for a single.
Chamu works one off the pads through square leg for a single ... and a horror return throw allows them to take a second run.
a bit of a bounding action, and he slants the first one down the leg side. Sibanda laps it along to fine leg for a couple.
better line, but still too straight from wide of the stumps. Clipped to the leg side as it straightens, for a single.
Chamu chips out, but isn't to the pitch and defends back down the track.
has Chamu stuck in the crease again with a searching middle and off line.

Chamu gets a boundary in risky fashion. He tumbles out of the crease and hoicks against the spin despite not getting to the length of the ball. The man running across from wide long-on made a mess of it and allowed it to run through for four.
wrong 'un to end the over, Chamu had enough time to spot it since it was short, and worked a single through square leg.
flat from Hafeez, Chamu pushes to Misbah at midwicket.
again nudged with the turn to Misbah.
tossed up on middle, Chamu gets the single this time to the left of Misbah.
flat line, and the innings is flat-lining too. Played back down the track to the bowler.
nicely done. Sibanda, unlike Chamu, gets to the flight of the ball and lofts it elegantly over the bowler's head. Nearly a six that.
flatter ball outside off to end the over, forced towards the covers.
back of a length outside off, Chamu tries to steer and misses.
gave that a lot of air, and it was driven in the air over cover-point. Not timed well enough to carry to the man in the deep.
googly? Sibanda looked to cut but was cramped and he missed it.
Sibanda has fifty, he gets to the flight and drives through wide mid-off. Well played. Can he pull it off today? As long as he doesn't pull, he looks ok ...
flighted outside off, Chamu leans out and check-drives to cover.
short and very wide, Chamu needlessly cut it for a single. Would have surely been a wide. That's the 100-run stand.
Chamu forces a short of length ball through wide mid-on for a single.
boy, he's launched that out of Harare. Tossed up amiably in the zone, Sibanda goes down on a knee and tonks it all the way over midwicket.
another nice-looking shot. Sibanda lofts a full ball over the bowler's head and Chamu hurries back for the second before Shafiq's weak throw makes it.
flatter line, Sibanda stays in the crease and blocks.
fuller length, Sibanda works it back to Hafeez on his follow through.
driven with the turn through mid-on for a single. Good over this for Zim.
back of a length from Yasir, pushed with the turn to the off side.

Sibanda commits suicide. He was looking good, and Zim aren't in a situation where they have to hit everything. He jumps out to this one, doesn't get to the flight but still tries to heave the loft over long-on. No luck, he finds the fielder in the deep and Yasir Shah has his first ODI wicket.
flighted ball, played into the off side bu Chamu.
shorter this time, and he squeezes a single through point.
sprayed down the leg side, Taylor laps it along to fine leg and they scoot across for a couple.
leg-stump again, and Taylor lashes it to deep midwicket for one more.
short of a length to start off, Taylor works it around with the angle to square leg.
fuller length, Taylor digs it out from the crease and defends to the off side.
full delivery again, Taylor didn't quite know where it went as he played all over it.
short and wide, Taylor cuts it hard and Hafeez reacts sharply at point to save it.
cramps Taylor this time with one that angles in, he's not able to push the single away.
first maiden of the innings, Taylor cuts feebly straight to point.
Chamu has 50. It's been a struggle, but he's gutsed it out there. Drives a full ball through mid-off for one.
nice shot from Taylor, sumptuous loft down the ground to a full ball and it's two more to the cause.
he sweeps hard this time, and the man at deep backward square nearly messes it up by charging in mindless of the spin on the ball
Chamu promptly hands it back to the captain with a single.
Taylor looks to come out of the crease again, and ends up playing a full ball down the track.
tries to sweep the last ball and misses, half an appeal from the bowler but that was too optimistic.
Chamu backs away, Cheema follows him and all he can do is push a single into the covers. A tight single at that.
short of a length on off stump, Taylor defends from the crease.

the in-form Taylor is gone. That's a cruel blow for Zim. Taylor tried to be innovative there, he was looking to guide a ball just outside off through to third man, manufacturing room as he set himself up beside the line. He couldn't get enough on it, and feathered it through to the keeper.
short ball to Masakadza first up and he taps to the leg side for a single.
short of a length and again, angling in towards Chamu even as he backs away, denying him of all room. Defended feebly into the off side.
sharp bouncer to end the over, and Chamu politely weaves out of the way.
Hamilton chips out to Yasis's flight and pushes into the off side.
worked off the pads through square leg, and Adnan hares after it to stop the second.
Chamu cracks a boundary, and like most of his big shots today, it's a memorable one. He jumps out, gets close to the pitch and drills it through the line over the covers.
stuck on the crease this time, he can't work the single away as Yasir shortens the length.
short again, this time Chamu heaves it away past midwicket inside the circle and gets a couple. The fielder in the deep does well to cut the boundary.
banged away. Chamu sets himself up for a juicy tossed up delivery and clatters the slog sweep away through midwicket, well to the right of the fielder.
slow and tossed up on middle and leg, it is played softly towards midwicket for a single.

dismissal, soft as a baby's bottom. Chamu has chipped a friendly length ball on off stump against the turn, inside out, straight into the hands of cover standing in the circle. Zimbabwe are losing too many wickets too quickly.
loopy ball on the middle and leg line, Taibu looks to work it to the leg side, but can't get it away.
humongous lbw appeal from Malik, but that surely hit Taibu outside the line as he pressed forward. Big turn from Malik, and a nice like to boot.
Taibu is away with an innovative chip shot over the top, and the fielder running in from long-on fumbles to allow him a second.
worked off the pads through wide mid-on for a single.
didn't take Taibu long to pull out the reverse sweep. He takes Yasir with the turn through third man for 2 more.
this one darts in towards the pads, and Taibu nudges a single backward of square leg for one more.
short ball, Masakadza whacks it through the covers off the back foot for one.
fuller length to Taibu who opens the face to guide a single through point.
slower and loopier outside off, Masakadza plays it back to the bowler.
another reverse sweep from Taibu! Did he get a top-edge? No, straight off the fore-arm and it lobs up between the keeper and short fine leg running in.
and now he top-edges a pre-meditated sweep. He might want to play straight for a while.
better from Taibu, hangs back and guides a short ball to short third man.
the ball seems to be stopping on the batsmen. Masakadza nearly pops a return catch to the bowler now.
Masakadza skips out and works a single with the turn through midwicket.
Taibu skips out and defends with a full face down the track, the single is taken as Malik can't stop it.
full length ball outside off, defended into the off side.
Taibu gets the single this time, driven into the covers.
Masakadza turns the strike over immediately, that's all Zim need for a while - singles.
Taibu defends Yasir's tight lines with the turn into the off side.
gives him no room whatsoever. Another ball defended from the crease back to Yasir.
back of a length outside off, Masakadza does well to guide it into the gap in the covers for a couple.
drifts into the pads this time, Masakadza works it with the turn towards backward square leg.
Taibu is the energiser bunny of batting. He jumps out, does a full rotation as he swings the bat and sends the ball into a portable pool on the grass banks. Stunning shot.
he jumps out again, not quite to the pitch this time and gets a single with another rotator-pull.
superb work from Yasir on the deep backward square leg fence, to keep Masakadza's sweep shot down to a single. He saves the ball and fires in a menacing return too.
Taibu's giving Pakistan some strife here. Full ball on middle and leg, he smites it with the turn through square leg.
back of a length, drives straight to cover.
loopy ball turning from middle stump, Masakadza turns the face early and gets a leading edge.
Yasir drifts this in towards the pads as Masakadza advances and lets out a huge appeal. No way that's out.
forced off the back foot straight to cover again.
now he gets the single after four dots, forced down the ground.
short ball to Taibu who carves it through midwicket for a couple.
Hamilton Sehwag! Upper cuts a shocking loosener all the way over the backward point boundary. That was banged in short at around 110 kph and it sat up, asking to be clobbered. Masakadza did.
much better ball, full and wide of off stump, Masakadza plays it into the covers.
back of a length outside off, Masakadza cracks it on the up straight to cover. Needs to get a single quickly here.
angled into the pads this time, Masakadza stays on strike as he nudges it to midwicket.
gets the single at long last, easing a short ball off the hips towards square leg.
short of a length outside off, and Taibu shows how single-pinching is done. He dead-bats the ball beside him and ambles across easily.
Taibu chips out, can't get to the pitch and blocks down the track.
googly from Yasir, hits the pad outside leg as Taibu misses it.
for a small man, Taibu more than gives it a wallop. Charges out, gets too close to the pitch by the looks of it, but that doesn't hinder his monster blow that nearly scuds all the way over long-off.
pegs him back with a skidder, Taibu can't get it away this time.

Younis Khan, take a bow! And they actually dropped this man from their team. He may be old, he may be close to the end of his career, but he's still among the fittest guys in this side. Short from Yasir, but he has the ability to skid along faster than you'd imagine. That's what spoiled Taibu's heaved sweep, but he should have still been safe. Someone forgot to tell Younis who zipped across to his right, dived full length and plucked it.
back of a length on off and middle, Masakadza forces a single through mid-on.
short ball to Masakadza who moves away and carves it through point. Umar Akmal, subbing for someone in the deep, does really well to keep it to one.
bouncer outside off, Sohail uses it as a dot-ball option. Waller can't connect with the dab and it is through to the keeper.
fuller length, worked into the off side, but can't find the gap.
Waller is away, he moves across the stumps with an opened face and guides a single towards third man.

Zimbabwe are disintegrating here, and it all down to inexperience. Slower ball from Sohail, Masakadza spotted it, but couldn't resist himself from pulling. Straight to Misbah at midwicket in the circle.
over-pitched on off stump, Chigumbura check-drives straight to cover.
zippy googly hurries into Yasir who blocks uncomfortably from the crease.
gets the single this time, opening the face and pushing into the off side.
fuller length, defended into the off side.
on the pads time, Chigumbura nudges towards Younis Khan and hustles back for a second. Younis fires in a sharp throw but the bowler doesn't collect. Could have been trouble if he had.
short ball outside off, Chigumbura cuts it to the deep for one more. 2 for 51 on debut for Yasir, and he has a lot of promise.
back of a length outside off, Chigumbura dabs it down to third man for a single.
short of a length on off stump, Waller angles it into the cover-point area.
back of a length outside off, Chigumbura defends towards point from the crease.
nice slower ball, full on off stump and Chigumbura defends it cautiously.
bouncer outside off, he never wastes the one-bouncer option. Chigumbura weaves out of the way.
top-class lengths from Sohail. Chigumbura can't do much, he tamely pushes it back down the track.
Waller tucks his first ball through square leg for one.
short and pacy outside off, angling in to cut out the room as well, and Chigumbura can't connect with the angled bat.
this time he hacks it away through the covers, despite not having much room to.
short ball, again angling in and Waller can't make contact with the pull.
gets a couple this time, driving Tanvir into the covers.
Waller opens the face and dabs a short of length ball to third man. Singles won't do it.
slower ball, beats Chigumbura all ends up as he feels for it cluelessly outside off.
short ball angling into Waller, who works it around to deep backward square leg for one.
rubbish ball from Cheema with the off side inside the circle! Short and wide outside off, whacked away over the covers.
Elton has perished. Short ball again from Cheema, but no width this time. Elton went for the pull, and looped it off the top edge to deep midwicket. Zim sink further.
Waller backs away, Cheema sees him and follows him. Waller doesn't have any room in the end, and misses the ball altogether.
he moves across to the off side this time, Cheema sticks to his guns with a sharp delivery angling in late, and Waller inner edges onto his pads.
bouncer outside off, zips through as Utseya watches and chooses to leave.
full and dead straight, Waller looks to hoist over the leg side. Too ambitious, he gets it off the toe-end of the bat towards mid-on.
slower ball outside off, Utseya spotted it late and could only get a single as he dabbed it off the glove to the off side.
yorker from wide of the crease, Waller can't connect again and it hits the pad and goes to the keeper.
Waller finally gets one away, pretty good shot too. He opened the face expertly to scythe the yorker through the covers and there's no one back on the off side.
emphatic. He gets under this one, there was enough room and it wasn't quite as full as the previous balls. Waller just tonks it over the cover cordon. Go fetch.
that's the length, the perfect yorker that tails in towards the toes. Waller barely digs it out, but gets the single.

the stumps go for a walk around the Harare Sports Club. Straight, length ball, challenging Waller to go for the cross-batted heave. He does and misses. The stumps are messed up. So are Zimbabwe's hopes.
short ball first up to Price, pulled without much conviction for a single.
slower ball well outside off, Utseya can't time the cut and Umar Akmal zips across to his left from cover to keep it to a single
Price looks to smote a length ball across the line and misses. Not too far from off stump, that.
angled in from wide of the crease, Price inner edges it to the leg side for a single.
sharp bouncer, and it is pulled away to deep square leg for a single.
Utseya jams a full ball from Tanvir to the leg side for a single.
slower ball on middle and off, Price nudges it with the angle to square leg.
short ball wasted down the leg side and it is called a wide.
another slower ball, and Utseya is early on the shot and pops it uppishly into the covers for one.
short and wide to Price, who backs away and clatters it through the covers.
Tanvir's radar's gone a little wonky, this one's a full toss that's headed down the leg side and is helped along off the glove towards fine leg for a single.
Utseya drills a full ball down the ground for a couple more. Too little for Zim, and I daresay, too late.
bouncer to Price and he pulls in front of square for a couple.
Price backs away and shows Cheema all his stumps. Cheema obliges by messing them up. He has four wickets.
Jarvis is welcomed to the crease with the perfect yorker, that must have jarred the toe-end of his bat a bit. He does well to dig it out.
Jarvis is away, forcing a single towards mid-off, and a direct hit might have given him a duck.

you won't see too many of those shots. Pulled through cover, inside out. Short ball well outside off, and he was so late on the shot it ballooned up over the covers. The "ducking off-bunt" is how the TV commentator puts it.
no five-for for Cheema, he finishes with a full length ball on the pads that is nudged to the leg side for one.
another short ball from Tanvir, Utseya drops it to the leg side and they take the single.
Jarvis backs away and drives, but he misses the line completely.
top-class slower ball that, Jarvis played his drive a year before the ball came. How did it miss the stumps?
short of a length outside off, Jarvis looks to cut and misses.
fuller ball this time, tailing in late and it is crunched off the inside edge through square leg.
back of a length outside off, Utseya guides it down to third man for a single.
Utseya squeezes a single through the cover-point area as Sohail keeps it full.
another slower ball, another complete miss as Jarvis plays well before the ball's arrival.
now the yorker aimed at the toes, Jarvis digs it out and Zim just can't get a boundary anywhere.
Jarvis backs away to a length ball angling in and works a single to deep square leg.
Utseya drives down the ground for a single.
Jarvis pushes another single down the ground. 35 needed off the last over. Where is Sobers? Where is Shastri? Where is Gibbs? Where is Yuvraj?
flat outside off, cut away through point for a couple. The game is officially out of Zim's reach unless Hafeez loses the plot in compelling manner.
Hafeez has the plot safely in his briefcase though. Flat ball aimed at the stumps, Jarvis misses the cut and timber meets leather.
tossed up to Vitori who lashes it to long-off for a single.
flat ball on middle and leg, worked through the leg side.
Vitori launches a full ball high over deep square leg and Shoaib Malik drops the tumbling catch. No harm done, a couple of runs taken.
the last ball hurries through and Vitori can't connect with the pull. Pakistan take the series 3-0 and that's a well-deserved clean sweep.
